abstract: Federal Mediation and Conciliation Service head George H Cohen will try to help the NBA and union leaders reach a new collective bargaining agreement to end the lockout.
snippet: A federal mediator next week will attempt to accomplish what months of intense negotiations did not: labor peace in the N.B.A.
lead_paragraph: A federal mediator next week will attempt to accomplish what months of intense negotiations did not: labor peace in the N.B.A.

headline.main: Federal Mediator to Meet With N.B.A. Sides
headline.print_headline: Federal Mediator to Meet With N.B.A. Sides
headline.seo: Federal Mediator to Meet With N.B.A. Sides
